name: FAIR N SQUARE
description:
Install the game from itch.io
The zip file from https://danidev.itch.io/fair-n-square is required

files.game: N/A:Please select the fairnsquare_linux.zip file downloaded from itch.io

content:
exe: fairnsquare.x86_64
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the fairnsquare_linux.zip file downloaded from itch.io
installer:
- extract:
    file: $game
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/fairnsquare.x86_64
